traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.description: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee:* +3, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.
